availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel Smith Mizner (Jessamine County, KY, physician)

body.p: Jessamine County, Kentucky, physician. Kentucky native. Married to Rosetta Mizner. Father of John S. Mizner, Caroline Mizner, and Hamlet S. Mizner. Graduated from Columbia College of Physicians and Surgeons in 1844. Physician in Garrard County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned five enslaved persons in Garrard County in 1850. Physician in Nicholasville in 1860. Owned five enslaved persons in Nicholasville in 1860.
